meanings.sent1: The givers at the charity event donated toys to children in need.
meanings.sent2: We should appreciate the givers who help those less fortunate.
meanings.sent3: The givers in the neighborhood always bring delicious treats to share.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the giver of wisdom among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The givers in the community spread kindness wherever they go.

meanings.sent3: The givers in the office always bring laughter to the team.
